text: NgeMini leyo abahanahanisi nabahanahanisikazi baya kuthi kwabo bakholwayo, “Khanisilindeni khon’ukuze sizuze inxalenye yokukhanya kwenu.” Kuya kuthiwa kubo: “Buyelani emva kwenu niye kufuna ukukhanya.” Ke kaloku udonga luya kubekwa phakathi kwabo lunocango, umphakathi walo unenceba, kodwa umphandle walo usisohlwayo
